description: IBM is a global technology and consulting firm, delivering solutions in cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and business services.
office_location: Armonk, New York, USA and various global offices
job_responsibility: As a Cloud Solutions Architect at IBM, you will design and implement innovative cloud solutions for clients. Your responsibilities include architecting cloud infrastructure, collaborating with clients to understand their needs, and leading the implementation of cloud-based projects to drive business success.
